# mirrorFields

```
POST /mirrorFields
{
  "field": { "string": ... },
  "matrix": [ [ [ (number), ... ], ... ], ... ]
}
--- 200 OK
{
  "field": { "string": ... },
  "matrix": [ [ [ (number), ... ], ... ], ... ]
}
```

| matrix | double[][][] |  |
